docs.title: Interactive Functions
docs.text:
This site collects reactive notebooks for exploring mathematical functions built with marimo.

Use the navigation to jump into the examples.

docs.title: Dispersal Kernels Explorer
docs.text:
Interactively compare several dispersal kernels and how their parameters shape the tails.

Info

The notebook below is executed at build time so it can import the local interactive_functions package without needing to publish it to PyPI.

Initializing... import%20sys%0Aif%20sys.platform%20%3D%3D%20%22emscripten%22%3A%0A%20%20%20%20try%3A%20%20%23%20pragma%3A%20no%20cover%20-%20only%20runs%20in%20Pyodide%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20__import__(%22interactive_functions%22)%20%20%23%20Avoid%20literal%20import%20to%20prevent%20micropip%20auto-fetch%0A%20%20%20%20except%20ModuleNotFoundError%3A%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%23%20Fetch%20and%20exec%20the%20lightweight%20helper%2C%20then%20run%20the%20installer%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20from%20urllib.parse%20import%20urljoin%0A%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20from%20js%20import%20fetch%2C%20window%20%20%23%20type%3A%20ignore%0A%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20origin%20%3D%20str(window.location.origin)%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20pathname%20%3D%20str(window.location.pathname)%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20site_root%20%3D%20%22%2Finteractive_functions%2F%22%20if%20%22%2Finteractive_functions%2F%22%20in%20pathname%20else%20%22%2F%22%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20base_href%20%3D%20origin%20%2B%20site_root%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20helper_url%20%3D%20urljoin(base_href%2C%20%22assets%2Fpy%2Fpyodide_utils.py%22)%0A%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20print(%22Loading%20Pyodide%20helper...%22%2C%20helper_url)%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20resp%20%3D%20await%20fetch(helper_url)%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20code%20%3D%20await%20resp.text()%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20scope%3A%20dict%20%3D%20%7B%7D%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20exec(code%2C%20scope)%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20await%20scope%5B%22ensure_local_wheel_installed%22%5D(%22interactive_functions%22) import%20marimo%20as%20mo%0Aimport%20numpy%20as%20np%0A%0A%23%20Import%20plotly%20components%20using%20explicit%20from-import%20to%20avoid%20parsing%20issues%0Atry%3A%0A%20%20%20%20from%20plotly%20import%20graph_objects%20as%20go%0Aexcept%20ImportError%3A%0A%20%20%20%20%23%20Fallback%20for%20environments%20where%20plotly%20is%20not%20available%0A%20%20%20%20go%20%3D%20None%0A%0Aimport%20importlib%0A%0A_if_mod%20%3D%20importlib.import_module(%22interactive_functions%22)%0AExponentialKernel%20%3D%20getattr(_if_mod%2C%20%22ExponentialKernel%22)%0AExpPowerKernel%20%3D%20getattr(_if_mod%2C%20%22ExpPowerKernel%22)%0AGaussianKernel%20%3D%20getattr(_if_mod%2C%20%22GaussianKernel%22)%0APowerLawKernel%20%3D%20getattr(_if_mod%2C%20%22PowerLawKernel%22)%0ARectangularHyperbolaKernel%20%3D%20getattr(_if_mod%2C%20%22RectangularHyperbolaKernel%22)%0Akernel_exponential%20%3D%20getattr(_if_mod%2C%20%22kernel_exponential%22)%0Akernel_exppower%20%3D%20getattr(_if_mod%2C%20%22kernel_exppower%22)%0Akernel_gaussian%20%3D%20getattr(_if_mod%2C%20%22kernel_gaussian%22)%0Akernel_powerlaw%20%3D%20getattr(_if_mod%2C%20%22kernel_powerlaw%22)%0Akernel_rectangular_hyperbola%20%3D%20getattr(_if_mod%2C%20%22kernel_rectangular_hyperbola%22)%0A_md_mod%20%3D%20importlib.import_module(%22interactive_functions.md_docs_parser%22)%0Adoc_to_markdown%20%3D%20getattr(_md_mod%2C%20%22doc_to_markdown%22) mo.md(%0A%20%20%20%20r%22%22%22%0A%23%20Dispersal%20Kernels%0AExplore%20common%20dispersal%20kernels%20and%20how%20parameters%20affect%20tail%20behavior.%0A%22%22%22%0A) mo.md(f%22%22%22%7Bdoc_to_markdown(kernel_exponential)%7D%22%22%22) lam_exp%20%3D%20mo.ui.slider(0.1%2C%20100.0%2C%20value%3D10.0%2C%20step%3D0.1%2C%20label%3D%22lambda%20(scale)%22)%0Amo.hstack(%5Blam_exp%5D) r_exp%20%3D%20np.linspace(0.0%2C%20200.0%2C%20800)%0Ak_exp%20%3D%20ExponentialKernel(lam%3Dlam_exp.value)%0Ay_exp%20%3D%20k_exp(r_exp)%0Afig_exp%20%3D%20go.Figure(go.Scatter(x%3Dr_exp%2C%20y%3Dy_exp%2C%20name%3D%22exponential%22))%0Afig_exp.update_layout(%0A%20%20%20%20title%3Dfr%22Exponential%20kernel%3Cbr%3E%7Bk_exp.math_str()%7D%3Cbr%3E%3Csup%3E%7Bk_exp.params_str()%7D%3C%2Fsup%3E%22%2C%0A%20%20%20%20yaxis_range%3D%5B-0.10%2C%201%5D%2C%0A%20%20%20%20xaxis_title%3D%22r%22%2C%0A%20%20%20%20yaxis_title%3D%22K(r)%22%2C%0A)%0Amo.ui.plotly(fig_exp) %23%20Display%20symbolic%20math%20and%20parameters%20separately mo.md(f%22%22%22%7Bdoc_to_markdown(kernel_gaussian)%7D%22%22%22) sigma_gauss%20%3D%20mo.ui.slider(0.1%2C%20100.0%2C%20value%3D10.0%2C%20step%3D0.1%2C%20label%3D%22sigma%20(scale)%22)%0Amo.hstack(%5Bsigma_gauss%5D) r_gauss%20%3D%20np.linspace(0.0%2C%20200.0%2C%20800)%0Ag_gauss%20%3D%20GaussianKernel(sigma%3Dsigma_gauss.value)%0Ay_gauss%20%3D%20g_gauss(r_gauss)%0Afig_gauss%20%3D%20go.Figure(go.Scatter(x%3Dr_gauss%2C%20y%3Dy_gauss%2C%20name%3D%22gaussian%22))%0Afig_gauss.update_layout(%0A%20%20%20%20title%3Dfr%22Gaussian%20kernel%3Cbr%3E%7Bg_gauss.math_str()%7D%3Cbr%3E%3Csup%3E%7Bg_gauss.params_str()%7D%3C%2Fsup%3E%22%2C%0A%20%20%20%20yaxis_range%3D%5B-0.10%2C%201%5D%2C%0A%20%20%20%20xaxis_title%3D%22r%22%2C%0A%20%20%20%20yaxis_title%3D%22K(r)%22%2C%0A)%0Amo.ui.plotly(fig_gauss) mo.md(f%22%22%22%7Bdoc_to_markdown(kernel_powerlaw)%7D%22%22%22) alpha_pl%20%3D%20mo.ui.slider(0.1%2C%20100.0%2C%20value%3D10.0%2C%20step%3D0.1%2C%20label%3D%22alpha%20(scale)%22)%0Ap_pl%20%3D%20mo.ui.slider(0.1%2C%2010.0%2C%20value%3D2.0%2C%20step%3D0.1%2C%20label%3D%22p%20(tail%20exponent)%22)%0Amo.hstack(%5Balpha_pl%2C%20p_pl%5D) r_pl%20%3D%20np.linspace(0.0%2C%20200.0%2C%20800)%0Apl_kernel%20%3D%20PowerLawKernel(alpha%3Dalpha_pl.value%2C%20p%3Dp_pl.value)%0Ay_pl%20%3D%20pl_kernel(r_pl)%0Afig_pl%20%3D%20go.Figure(go.Scatter(x%3Dr_pl%2C%20y%3Dy_pl%2C%20name%3D%22power-law%22))%0Afig_pl.update_layout(%0A%20%20%20%20title%3Dfr%22Power-law%20kernel%3Cbr%3E%7Bpl_kernel.math_str()%7D%3Cbr%3E%3Csup%3E%7Bpl_kernel.params_str()%7D%3C%2Fsup%3E%22%2C%0A%20%20%20%20yaxis_range%3D%5B-0.10%2C%201%5D%2C%0A%20%20%20%20xaxis_title%3D%22r%22%2C%0A%20%20%20%20yaxis_title%3D%22K(r)%22%2C%0A)%0Amo.ui.plotly(fig_pl) mo.md(f%22%22%22%7Bdoc_to_markdown(kernel_rectangular_hyperbola)%7D%22%22%22) alpha_rh%20%3D%20mo.ui.slider(0.1%2C%20100.0%2C%20value%3D10.0%2C%20step%3D0.1%2C%20label%3D%22alpha%20(scale)%22)%0Ap_rh%20%3D%20mo.ui.slider(0.1%2C%2010.0%2C%20value%3D2.0%2C%20step%3D0.1%2C%20label%3D%22p%20(shape)%22)%0Amo.hstack(%5Balpha_rh%2C%20p_rh%5D) r_rh%20%3D%20np.linspace(0.0%2C%20200.0%2C%20800)%0Arh_kernel%20%3D%20RectangularHyperbolaKernel(alpha%3Dalpha_rh.value%2C%20p%3Dp_rh.value)%0Ay_rh%20%3D%20rh_kernel(r_rh)%0Afig_rh%20%3D%20go.Figure(go.Scatter(x%3Dr_rh%2C%20y%3Dy_rh%2C%20name%3D%22rectangular%20hyperbola%22))%0Afig_rh.update_layout(%0A%20%20%20%20title%3Dfr%22Rectangular%20hyperbola%20kernel%3Cbr%3E%7Brh_kernel.math_str()%7D%3Cbr%3E%3Csup%3E%7Brh_kernel.params_str()%7D%3C%2Fsup%3E%22%2C%0A%20%20%20%20yaxis_range%3D%5B-0.10%2C%201%5D%2C%0A%20%20%20%20xaxis_title%3D%22r%22%2C%0A%20%20%20%20yaxis_title%3D%22K(r)%22%2C%0A)%0Amo.ui.plotly(fig_rh) mo.md(f%22%22%22%7Bdoc_to_markdown(kernel_exppower)%7D%22%22%22) lam_ep%20%3D%20mo.ui.slider(0.1%2C%20100.0%2C%20value%3D10.0%2C%20step%3D0.1%2C%20label%3D%22lambda%20(scale)%22)%0Aq_ep%20%3D%20mo.ui.slider(0.1%2C%204.0%2C%20value%3D1.5%2C%20step%3D0.1%2C%20label%3D%22q%20(shape)%22)%0Amo.hstack(%5Blam_ep%2C%20q_ep%5D) r_ep%20%3D%20np.linspace(0.0%2C%20200.0%2C%20800)%0Aep_kernel%20%3D%20ExpPowerKernel(lam%3Dlam_ep.value%2C%20q%3Dq_ep.value)%0Ay_ep%20%3D%20ep_kernel(r_ep)%0Afig_ep%20%3D%20go.Figure(go.Scatter(x%3Dr_ep%2C%20y%3Dy_ep%2C%20name%3D%22exp-power%22))%0Afig_ep.update_layout(%0A%20%20%20%20title%3Dfr%22Exponential-power%20kernel%3Cbr%3E%7Bep_kernel.math_str()%7D%3Cbr%3E%3Csup%3E%7Bep_kernel.params_str()%7D%3C%2Fsup%3E%22%2C%0A%20%20%20%20yaxis_range%3D%5B-0.10%2C%201%5D%2C%0A%20%20%20%20xaxis_title%3D%22r%22%2C%0A%20%20%20%20yaxis_title%3D%22K(r)%22%2C%0A)%0Amo.ui.plotly(fig_ep)
